file_content.text: I'll make sure Darth Lachris knows what you've done here.
Take as many resistance targets as you can. In the name of Darth Lachris.
You must be Colonel Proshen.
Yes, my lord. We've been expecting you.
And you must be the Cipher agent. It's my pleasure.
Ah, yes--the mercenary. You're... different than I expected.
This army the resistance has gathered... we're losing the last battle of the war, and manpower isn't our problem.
But Darth Lachris promises you can help, and I've learned to trust her judgment.
Tell me what your forces require.
I'll do what must be done.
How long have you worked for the Darth?
Do you know Lachris well?
My division worked under her during the occupation of Vaced--street-to-street fighting for the Emperor's glory.
Neither Lachris nor I require your trust--only your obedience.
Never question the Sith.
Of course, my lord. Apologies.
It's not your place to trust or not. The Sith rule, and we obey.
Never question the Sith.
You're right, of course.
Never put your faith in a Sith Lord.
I wouldn't trust her.
I'll pretend I didn't hear that, hunter.
I've asked my men to identify priority resistance targets for you--you'll move at your discretion, and we'll supply you with anything you need.
And be careful if you stray into the toxic areas of the valley--we're receiving reports of some sort of insectoid infestation. Even the resistance stays clear.
Understand, Colonel--the resistance is doomed.
Time we get to work.
I've met your insects before--man-sized, genetically engineered killing machines.
Sounds like Colicoids.
Then maybe you can assist us on that front, as well.
What can you tell me about these insects?
What sort of infestation?
Local forces have encountered them before, but we haven't received that data yet--all we know is that they're deadly.
The base is yours--anything I can do, let me know.
Spare me your advice. I'll do what your men couldn't: win this war.
Just stay out of my way.
In the name of the Emperor, and Darth Lachris.
Surprised to see you all the way out here.
